hymn.title: Once I was dead in sin

lyrics.stanza: Once I was dead in sin, And hope within me died; But now I'm dead to sin, With Christ I'm crucified.
And can it be that "He loved me, And gave Himself for me"?
O height I cannot reach! O depth I cannot sound! O love, O boundless love, In my Redeemer found!
I live—and yet not I, But Christ that lives in me, Who from the law of sin And death has made me free.
